title: Food Personality Test
description: Discover your personality type based on your food preferences!

questions.question: When you're hungry, what food comes to mind first?

choices.text: Fast food like pizza or burgers

questions.question: What's your attitude toward new foods?

choices.text: I want to try it first!
I'll try if friends recommend it

questions.question: What food do you prefer when eating alone?
Where do you usually choose to eat out?

choices.text: A place where I can go with friends

questions.question: What do you eat when stressed?
How do you choose food when traveling?

choices.text: Local traditional food is a must!
I prefer meal kits or convenience food

questions.question: Do you take photos of food?

choices.text: Always! It's a must before eating
I take photos if it's delicious

results.title: Comfort Food Lover
results.description: You're a comfort food lover who finds warm solace in food! You love the cozy flavors like mom's home cooking from childhood and find emotional stability through food. You have a sentimental personality with lots of warmth, someone who knows how to find happiness in everyday moments.
results.advice: Try challenging new foods sometimes. You might discover unexpected joy.

results.title: Gourmet Explorer
results.description: You're a gourmet explorer who seeks intense experiences in food! You're passionate about delicious food and value having a proper meal. You know your preferences well and have a personality that doesn't compromise.
results.advice: Respect others' tastes too. You might enjoy food from new perspectives.

results.title: Healthy Foodie
results.description: You're a healthy foodie pursuing a healthy lifestyle! You're careful about food choices and try to eat what's good for your body. You have a thorough self-management personality and think from a long-term perspective.
results.advice: Sometimes it's okay to eat whatever you feel like. Enjoyment is also part of health.

results.title: Trendsetter
results.description: You're a trendsetter chasing new flavors and trends! You're interested in hotspots and new foods, viewing eating as part of your lifestyle. You're a person with unique and refined taste.
results.advice: Don't just follow trends - find your own taste too.

results.title: Social Diner
results.description: You're a social diner who knows the joy of eating together! You value the time with people more than the food itself. You have a sociable and cheerful personality, someone who creates atmosphere wherever you go.
results.advice: Try solo dining too. You might discover your own tastes.

results.title: Flavor Adventurer
results.description: You're a flavor adventurer who challenges new tastes! You're curious about unfamiliar foods and enjoy trying things you've never eaten. You have an open and adventurous personality, pursuing new experiences in life too.
results.advice: Sometimes discover new things in familiar flavors too.

results.title: Traditional Gastronome
results.description: You're a traditional gastronome who appreciates time-tested flavors! You love proven restaurants and authentic recipes, and are interested in food history and culture. You have a careful and deep personality who values essence.
results.advice: Keep an open mind about new fusion foods. There might be unexpected harmonies.

results.title: Fun Foodie
results.description: You're a fun foodie who simply enjoys eating! You like everything delicious and don't overthink about food. You have a positive and optimistic personality, someone who knows how to find happiness in small things.
results.advice: Plan a special food experience sometimes. You might discover new joys.
